app.framework

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.framework.Application
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TodoApp

    public abstract class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    The Application class describes a complete MVC application.

    The class takes care of constructing the main application frame and passing it on to subclasses. To create a new MVC application one must therefore extend the Application class and implement the start(JFrame) method: 

     public final class MyApp extends Application {
   protected void start(final JFrame frame) {
     frame.getContentPane().add(...);
   }

   public static void main(final String[] args) {
     new MyApp();
   }
 }
    See Also:
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Model%E2%80%93view%E2%80%93controller
